name: Gemmer Sojan
ability: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

name: Arvel Crynyd
ability: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

name: Jake Farrell
ability: After you perform a focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

name: Tycho Celchu
ability: You may perform actions even while you have a stress token.

name: Nera Dantels
ability: You can perform {torpedo} secondary weapon attacks at ships outside your firing arc.

name: Ibtisam
ability: When attacking or defending, if you have at least one stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

name: Keyan Farlander
ability: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your {eye} results to {hit} results.

name: Ten Numb
ability: When attacking, 1 of your {critical} results cannot be cancelled by defense dice.

name: Etahn A\u2019baht
ability: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its {hit} results to a {critical} result.

name: Corran Horn
ability: At the start of the End phase, you may perform 1 attack. You may not attack next round.

name: Tarn Mison
ability: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

name: Hobbie Klivian
ability: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

name: Biggs Darklighter
ability: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

name: Garven Dreis
ability: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

name: Jek Porkins
ability: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a {hit} result, deal 1 facedown damage card to this ship.

name: Luke Skywalker
ability: When defending, you may change 1 of your {eye} results to a {evade} result.

name: Wedge Antilles
ability: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0)

name: Wes Janson
ability: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade or blue target lock token from the defender.

name: \u201cBlue Ace\u201d
ability: When performing a boost action, you may use the [{turn_left} 1] or [{turn_right} 1] template.

name: \u201cRed Ace\u201d
ability: The first time you remove a shield token from your ship each round, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

name: Poe Dameron
ability: While attacking or defending, if you have a focus token, you may change 1 of your {eye} results to a {hit} or {evade} result.

name: \u201cDutch\u201d Vander
ability: After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2. The ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

name: Horton Salm
ability: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

name: Roark Garnet
ability: At the start of the combat phase choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3. Until the end of the phase, treat that pilot's pilot skill value as 12.

name: Kyle Katarn
ability: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

name: Jan Ors
ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Lieutenant Blount
ability: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

name: Airen Cracken
ability: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action.

name: Esege Tuketu
ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your focus tokens as its own.

name: Miranda Doni
ability: Once per round when attacking, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

name: Chewbacca
ability: When you are dealt a faceup damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

name: Lando Calrissian
ability: After you execute a green maneuver, choose one other friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action on its action bar.

name: Han Solo
ability: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice. If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

name: Eaden Vrill
ability: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack dice.

name: \u201cLeebo\u201d
ability: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve and discard the other.

name: Dash Rendar
ability: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

name: CR90 Corvette (Fore)
ability: When attacking with your primary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to roll 1 additional attack die. Range 3-5.

name: Night Beast
ability: After executing a green manoeuvre, you may perform a free focus action.

name: Winged Gundark
ability: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your {hit} results to a {critical} result.

name: Backstabber
ability: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Dark Curse
ability: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

name: \u201cScourge\u201d
ability: When attacking a defender that has 1 or more Damage cards, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Mauler Mithel
ability: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: \u201cHowlrunner\u201d
ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

name: \u201cZeta Ace\u201d
ability: When performing a barrel roll, you may use the [{forward}2] (instead of the [{forward}1] template).

name: \u201cEpsilon Leader\u201d
ability: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from each friendly ship at Range 1.

name: \u201cOmega Ace\u201d
ability: When attacking, you may spend a focus token and a target lock you have on the defender to change all your results to {critical} results.

name: \u201cOmega Leader\u201d
ability: Enemy ships that you have locked cannot modify any dice when attacking you or defending against your attacks.

name: Lieutenant Colzet
ability: At the start of the End phase, you may spend a target lock you have on an enemy ship to flip 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to it faceup.

name: Commander Alozen
ability: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.

name: Zertik Strom
ability: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot add their range combat bonus when attacking.

name: Maarek Stele
ability: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

name: Juno Eclipse
ability: When you reveal your maneuver, you may increase or decrease its speed by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

name: Darth Vader
ability: During your Perform Action step, you may perform 2 actions.

name: Captain Jonus
ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

name: Major Rhymer
ability: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

name: Colonel Vessery
ability: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

name: Rexler Brath
ability: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

name: \u201cFel's Wrath\u201d
ability: When the number of damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed unti the end of the round.

name: Lieutenant Lorrir
ability: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the 1 {bank_left} or {bank_right} template instead of the 1 {forward} template.

name: Kir Kanos
ability: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add one {hit} result to you roll.

name: Tetran Cowall
ability: When you reveal a {koiogram} maneuver, you may treat the speed of that meaneuver as 1,3 or 5.

name: Turr Phennir
ability: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

name: Carnor Jax
ability: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

name: Soontir Fel
ability: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

name: \u201cEcho\u201d
ability: When you decloak, you must use the [{bank_left}2] or [{bank_right}2] template instead of the [{forward}2] template.

name: \u201cWhisper\u201d
ability: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

name: \u201cDeathrain\u201d
ability: When dropping a bomb, you may use the front guides of your ship. After dropping a bomb you may perform a free barrel roll action.

name: \u201cRedline\u201d
ability: You may maintain 2 target locks on the same ship. When you acquire a target lock, you may acquire a second lock on that ship.

name: The Inquisitor
ability: When attacking with your primary weapon at Range 2-3, treat the range of the attack as Range 1.

name: Krassis Trelix
ability: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Kath Scarlet
ability: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 {critical} result.

name: Boba Fett
ability: When you reveal a bank maneuver ({bank_left} or {bank_right}), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

name: Captain Yorr
ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

name: Colonel Jendon
ability: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

name: Captain Kagi
ability: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

name: Captain Oicunn
ability: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 Damage.

name: Commander Kenkirk
ability: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
ability: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your {eye} results to a {critical} result.

name: Raider-class Corvette (fore)
ability: Once per round, after you perform a primary weapon attack, you may spend 2 energy to perform another primary weapon attack.

name: Laetin A\u2019shera
ability: After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

name: Serissu
ability: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, he may reroll 1 defense dice.

name: Graz the Hunter
ability: When defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Talonbane Cobra
ability: When attacking or defending, double the effect of your range combat bonuses.

name: Drea Renthal
ability: After you spend a target lock, you may receive 1 stress token to acquire a target lock.

name: Kavil
ability: When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Torkhil Mux
ability: At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as 0.

name: Palob Godalhi
ability: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

name: Dace Bonearm
ability: When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least 1 ion token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

name: Kaa\u2019to Leeachos
ability: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

name: N\u2019Dru Suhlak
ability: When attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Guri
ability: At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship

name: Prince Xizor
ability: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncancelled {hit} or {critical} result instead of you.

name: Emon Azzameen
ability: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [{turn_left}3], [{forward}3] or [{turn_right}3] template instead of the [{forward}1] template.

name: Kath Scarlet
ability: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional die.

name: Boba Fett
ability: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy at Range 1.

name: IG88-A
ability: After you perform an attack that destroys the defender, you may recover 1 shield.

name: IG88-B
ability: Once per round, after you perform an attack that does not hit, you may perform an attack with an equipped {cannon} secondary weapon.

name: IG88-C
ability: After you perform a boost action, you may perform a free evade action.

name: IG88-D
ability: You may execute the {segnor_left} or {segnor_right} manoeuvre using the corresponding [{turn_left} 3] or [{turn_right} 3] template.

name: Latts Razzi
ability: When a friendly ship declares an attack, you may spend a target lock you have on the defender to reduce its agility by 1 for that attack.

name: Moralo Eval
ability: You can perform {cannon} secondary weapon attacks against ships inside your auxiliary firing arc.

name: Bossk
ability: When you perform an attack that hits, before dealing damage, you may cancel 1 of your {critical} results to add 2 {hit} results.

name: Dengar
ability: Once per round after defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, you may perform an attack against that ship.
